thread.title: Apple says OS X 10.11.1 update will fix Microsoft Office 2016 crashes
thread.title_full: Apple says OS X 10.11.1 update will fix Microsoft Office 2016 crashes

title: Apple says OS X 10.11.1 update will fix Microsoft Office 2016 crashes
text:
Apple says OS X 10.11.1 update will fix Microsoft Office 2016 crashes 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
an update to the El Capitan operating system, which it said will sort out problems Mac users are having with Microsoft Office 2016 on the latest OS. 
Apple promises that the...
